item.description:
Just got my tickets for this - should be an awesome show, this is a special "Acoustic Tour" from MMW with only a few dates on the East Coast. They will be playing in Jordan Hall, one of Boston's nicest theaters.

The show is supposed to start at 8:00 with doors opening at 7:30, it's a reserved seating show.  Let's meet for drinks at Pizzeria Uno at 280 Huntington Ave. before the concert, it's on the same block as Gainsborough.  I'll be there starting at 6:45.  I'll send my cell number to attendees in advance.

 

Here is the link for tickets - you must purchase them on your own.  It's reserved seating, so all of us won't sit together but we'll get together before and after the show.

 

http://www.ticketmaster.com/event/010048D2CC0AB6D2?artistid=773221&majorcatid=10001&minorcatid=4

Also, be advised that tickets are NOT available at the Jordan Hall box office, there is no way to avoid the Ticketmaster fees on this show :-(
item.name: Medeski, Martin & Wood October 5th Jordan Hall
